title: Burbank, California
summary: Burbank is a city in the southeastern end of the San Fernando Valley in Los Angeles County, California. Located 12 miles (19Â km) northwest of downtown Los Angeles, Burbank is well known for being home to Walt Disney Studios, Warner Bros. Studios, and Nickelodeon Animation Studios. as well as having the largest IKEA in the United States. The population at the 2010 census was 103,340.[8]
